authors: Justin J. Birchler, Kara S. Doran, Hilary F. Stockdon, and Heather A. Schreppel
citation.title: Tropical Storm Hermine in the Coastal Change Hazards Portal

facebook.title: Photos from USGS Coastal and Ocean Science's post
facebook.summary:
The storm team is responding to Tropical Storm Hermine. 

View probabilities of coastal change in the Coastal Change Hazards Portal at http://dx.doi.org/10.5066/F7X63K24.

See forecasts of total water levels at http://coastal.er.usgs.gov/hurricanes/researc

facebook.title: Timeline Photos
facebook.summary:
As Hermine transitions from the Gulf of Mexico to the Atlantic Ocean, our coastal change forecasts are focusing on potential impacts to the Outer Banks, NC.

See forecasts of total water levels at http://coastal.er.usgs.gov/hurricanes/research/operational-
